title: Two children dead and six rushed to hospital in Canada after bus crashes into nursery
description: Two children have died and six have been rushed to hospital after a bus crashed into a day care centre in Quebec.

title: Chinese 'spy' balloons spotted over five continents, say US officials
description: Chinese 'spy' balloons have been spotted in skies above countries across five continents, US officials have announced.

title: 'We will cry later': The volunteers feeding thousands left desperate by Turkey-Syria earthquake
description: Exhausted yet defiant, two volunteers are putting aside their emotions to help survivors devastated by an earthquake that has claimed more than 12,000 lives.

title: Rescuers flood into Hatay - but face a scene of utterly mind-blowing devastation
description: The tempo of the earthquake rescue operation has changed dramatically in Hatay in southern Turkey.

title: Rishi Sunak says 'nothing off table' after Zelenskyy travels to UK to make plea for fighter jets
description: Rishi Sunak has said "nothing is off the table" when it comes to assisting the war effort in Ukraine and fighter jets "are part of the conversation".

title: Huge queues snake through snowy villages where government aid is yet to arrive and the air is -8C
description: It was still dark when we left.

title: Is more aid being sent to Turkey than Syria following the earthquake?
description: As offers of aid from countries across the globe have poured in after this week's earthquake tragedy, a stark divide can be seen in the offers for Turkey and those for Syria.

title: How you can help save lives as urgent TV appeals planned for earthquake response
description: UK charities will launch an appeal to raise urgent funds to help people affected by the devastating earthquakes in Turkey and Syria.

title: 'Strong' signs Putin to blame for supplying missile that shot down MH17
description: There are "strong indications" Russian President Vladimir Putin personally approved the decision to supply the missile system used to shoot down Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 over Ukraine, an international team has said.

title: Trapped boy given water by rescue workers
description: Heart-wrenching footage has captured the moment rescue workers gave a little boy water with a bottle cap before pulling him out of wreckage nearly 45 hours after the Turkey-Syria earthquake.

title: China's COVID surge produced no new variants, analysis suggests
description: No new COVID variants have emerged during China's recent surge in cases, according to new analysis.

title: Satellite imagery shows scale of destruction following Turkey-Syria earthquake
description: Satellite images from three devastated towns in southern Turkey show the scale of the devastation wrought by Monday's huge earthquakes in vivid detail.

title: 'I can do a cut-price rate of €1,500': How police exposed the dark world of small boat crossings
description: This is a story of international crime, desperate people and politics. It starts with a man driving a dusty vehicle towards the north French coast on a summer night.

title: Six men jailed for people-smuggling after joint operation by British and French police
description: Six men have been convicted of people-smuggling and sent to prison following a joint operation between British and French police.

title: Kim Jong Un makes rare appearance with daughter at military banquet
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has made a rare public appearance alongside his daughter amid growing speculation the country is preparing a large military parade to showcase its nuclear weapons programme.

title: Russia will not run out of weapons 'any time soon' and Putin hopes to 'bomb' Ukraine to negotiating table, European spy agency warns
description: Russia will not run out of weapons or troops for its war "any time soon" and Vladimir Putin thinks he can "bomb" Ukraine to the negotiating table, a European spy agency has warned.

title: 'Children were so scared': Left terrified and freezing, homeless earthquake victims travel for days to seek refuge
description: Tens of thousands of people have been left homeless after a 7.8 magnitude earthquake devastated southern Turkey and northern Syria on Monday.

title: More than 11,000 confirmed dead in Turkey and Syria in deadliest earthquake in over a decade
description: More than 11,000 people have died after devastating earthquakes rocked Turkey and Syria.

title: Whatever Biden has so far achieved, he can't shake a negative public perception
description: Joe Biden came out punching on Capitol Hill in a way that belied learned expectation.

title: Joe Biden vows to work with political rivals in his latest State of the Union address
description: Joe Biden has vowed to work with political rivals in his latest State of the Union address.
